law.history: Repealed 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 45, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 232, sec. 10, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 269, sec. 2. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 13, effective July 1, 1958. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 22, effective June 15, 1950.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Standards of certificate holder's rates and services.
